sentences.sContent: They talked modestly of their valiant efforts to keep the tanker afloat.
sentences.sCn: 他们谦虚地谈论了他们为让油轮保持不沉而付出的英勇努力。

synos.tran: 在海上的；飘浮的；浸满水的；在传播的

trans.tranOther: If someone or something is afloat, they remain partly above the surface of water and do not sink

trans.tranCn: 漂浮的；有偿债能力的，能维持下去的
